com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain

Class Currency

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.merchant.sdk.domain.Currency

  • public final class Currency
extends java.lang.Object
    Constant class for the possible currencies used within the application. This class simply wraps the integer code used in the payment application for type safety.

      • getISOCurrencyCode

        public java.lang.String getISOCurrencyCode()
        Returns the ISO 4217 currency code returned from the applet that matches to this currency. Source for the ISO 4217 currency codes : http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php
        Returns:
        ISO currency code
